tool.name: Krona pie chart
tool.command: #if $input.ext == 'taxonomy' ktImportGalaxy "${input}" -o "${output}" #else metaphlan2krona.py -p "${input}" -k krona.txt; ktImportText krona.txt -o "${output}" #end if

param.name: input
param.label: Input file
param.help: Either a MetaPhlAn tabular result file or a taxonomy file

tool.help:
**What it does**
This tool converts the standard result file of a metagenomic profiling in a zoomable pie chart using Krona_. It takes as input datasets produced by *MetaPhlAn*, *Fetch taxonomic representation*, *Find lowest diagnostic rank* and *Filter taxonomy* tools.
.. _Krona: http://sourceforge.net/p/krona/home/krona/
